item.title: Mashpi: a cocoon in an Ecuadorian cloud forest
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
I have a special place in my heart for cloud forests. There’s something undeniably magical about being in a world of trees, where every view is of hills of green wrapped in thick bands of mist, and every piece of moss is covered in jewel-like droplets of water. After a week in the natural Disneyworld […]

The post Mashpi: a cocoon in an Ecuadorian cloud forest appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: Saving Costa Rica’s sea turtles
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
It was midnight on a hot, sticky Costa Rican beach and I was so exhausted from jet lag that I had started hallucinating dark shapes in the ocean. We’d been walking on the starlit beach for a few hours following our enthusiastic guide, Kloyd Taylor, whose response to almost anything was a cheery “Pura vida!”. […]

The post Saving Costa Rica’s sea turtles appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: A Costa Rican adventure
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
I’m pretty excited about my next assignment: a 10-day trip to Costa Rica with Contiki Cares! I’m joining 11 other people from around the world – the three winners of the recent #contikistorytellers competition, as well as photographers, filmmakers, bloggers and Celine Cousteau, a celebrated documentary filmmaker. The itinerary, based on a Contiki’s Costa Rica unplugged trip sounds epic – […]

The post A Costa Rican adventure appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.
